languages.text: {n}Каждый из них передавал слова дружбы от пославших их правителей. Каждый из них испросил дозволения посетить фамильный склеп династии, чтобы отдать дань памяти Леди Теодоре.{/n}
{n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Каждый из них передавал слова дружбы от пославших их правителей. Каждый из них испросил дозволения посетить фамильный склеп династии, чтобы отдать дань памяти Леди Теодоре.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Each of them conveyed the words of friendship from the rulers who had sent them. And each of them asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay their tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}
{n}Each of them conveyed the words of friendship from the rulers who had sent them. And each of them asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay their tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}
{n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}
{n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}
{n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}
{n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}每位星语者都传达了来自他们主人的友好问候，并请求拜访王朝家族墓穴，向已故的西奥多拉夫人致敬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}每位星语者都传达了来自他们主人的友好问候，并请求拜访王朝家族墓穴，向已故的西奥多拉夫人致敬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cada uno de ellos transmitió palabras amables de los gobernantes que los habían enviado. Y cada uno pidió permiso para visitar la cripta de la familia para rendir homenaje a Lady Theodora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cada uno de ellos transmitió palabras amables de los gobernantes que los habían enviado. Y cada uno pidió permiso para visitar la cripta de la familia para rendir homenaje a Lady Theodora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らそれぞれが、自分達を派遣した支配者たちからの友好の言葉を伝えた。そしてそれぞれが、レディ・シオドーラに敬意を表するために一族の地下墓地を訪れる許可を求めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らそれぞれが、自分達を派遣した支配者たちからの友好の言葉を伝えた。そしてそれぞれが、レディ・シオドーラに敬意を表するために一族の地下墓地を訪れる許可を求めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Chacun d'eux transmet des messages amicaux de la part des souverains qui les envoient et chacun demande l'autorisation de visiter la crypte familiale pour rendre hommage à dame Théodora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Chacun d'eux transmet des messages amicaux de la part des souverains qui les envoient et chacun demande l'autorisation de visiter la crypte familiale pour rendre hommage à dame Théodora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein jeder überbrachte freundliche Worte von dem Herrscher, der ihn gesandt hatte. Und ein jeder bat um die Erlaubnis, die Gruft der Familie besuchen zu dürfen, um Lady Theodora den letzten Respekt zu erweisen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein jeder überbrachte freundliche Worte von dem Herrscher, der ihn gesandt hatte. Und ein jeder bat um die Erlaubnis, die Gruft der Familie besuchen zu dürfen, um Lady Theodora den letzten Respekt zu erweisen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Her biri, kendilerini gönderen hükümdarların dostluk sözlerini iletti ve Leydi Theodora'ya hürmetlerini sunmak için aile mahzenini ziyaret etme izni istedi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Each of them conveyed words of amity from the rulers who had sent them. And each asked permission to visit the family crypt to pay tribute to Lady Theodora.{/n}
